ingredients.item: 2 medium essential Waitrose Free Range Eggs
½ x 25g pack fresh chives, chopped
½ x 25g pack fresh parsley, chopped
150g pack Waitrose Kiln Roasted Scottish Salmon Slices

instructions.step: Cook the eggs in boiling water for 5 minutes, leave to cool in cold water, peel and set aside.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the onions for 2-3 minutes, add the oatmeal and cook for a further 2-3 minutes, season and add the herbs.
Toss the salad with the dressing and half the oatmeal, top with the salmon (in large flakes) and sprinkle with the remaining oatmeal. Top with halved boiled eggs.
